item.description:
("Hücrebaz" is defined as equivalent of "Cell Master")

How do mobile phones work? How do they communicate among themselves?How is communication provided by the switchboards?

Not through satellite communications as many people imagine. Satellites are only engaged in intercontinental and similar situations, but under normal conditions, communications are being established on the earth by means of radio and transmission antennas at the tower or building-like heights that are located on base stations in close proximity to each other.

The stations that are planned to be established on certain areas on the map provide service in those areas so that the subscribers in the area can communicate with mobile phones.

The stations required for communication with mobile phones are not able to provide service very far since the outpu powers are not very high and a new station must be installed after a certain distance.

Our game starts at this point... As your mobile phoine infrastructure service provider, your aim and your job; to decide which base station should be installed in which area, to rent the area, to set up the required base station and to cover all the cells where the subscribers is located on the map...

In this direction your goal to win the game is not to cover the areas more than your competitors, but the total number of subscribers you have covered have to be higher. As you upgrade your established towers, your coverage will expand to the extent.

In places where the towes are to be installed, it is necessary to obtain the right of installation by renting. Every cell that is rented or covered is painted in the player's own color and yet controlled by the player. Sometimes luck turns; extra prizes are won, but sometimes they do not get lucky; with public reactions, natural disasters or theft, the player may lose control of his place or resurces.

Rent Sites
Install Towers
Cover Cells

Components:
Game board pieces (8 units)
Active Player Token (1 unit)
Special Chance Dice (2 units)
Chance Cards (52 cards)
Summary Cards (2 cards)
Game Guide (1 unit)
Tower Piece Part 1 (30 units)
Tower Piece Part 2 (24 units)
Tower Piece Part 3 (18 units)
Tower Piece Part 4 (12 units)
Tower Piece Part 5 (6 units)
Blue Coverage Token (100 units)
Red Coverage Token (100 units)
Green Coverage Token (100 units)
Yellow Coverage Token (100 units)
1 Gold (40 units)
5 Gold (10 units)
1 Metal (40 units)
10 Gold (10 units)

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
